mapper.insert: insert into kong_board ( title, content, writer ) values( #{title},#{content},#{writer} )
mapper.select: SELECTbno, TITLE, WRITER, REGDATE FROM kong_board ORDER BY bno DESC

SELECT BNO,TITLE,CONTENT,WRITER,REGDATE,CNT FROM (SELECT BNO,TITLE,CONTENT,WRITER,REGDATE,CNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM kong_board WHERE 1=1
) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BNO DESC

SELECT COUNT(BNO) FROM kong_board WHERE 1=1
AND BNO > 0
